lead_paragraph: The High Court in London upheld the lifetime ban imposed on Dwain Chambers in 2003 after the British sprinter confessed to using performance-enhancing drugs. Chambers was seeking an injunction so he could join the British Olympic team in Beijing.
snippet: The High Court in London upheld the lifetime ban imposed on Dwain Chambers in 2003 after the British sprinter confessed to using performance-enhancing drugs. Chambers was seeking an injunction so he could join the British Olympic team in Beijing.
